summary:
Title: The Amazing Spider-Man #18
Summary: The Hunted story arc has really redeemed the ASM comics for me. This is another good...
body:
Title: The Amazing Spider-Man #18

Summary: The Hunted story arc has really redeemed the ASM comics for me. This is another good issue that’s expanding on the back story while keeping the reader hooked. My only complaint is the art, it’s not bad, but I’m just not personally a huge fan of Ramos. If this story was being drawn by somebody else I’d be rating it even higher!

Rating: 8.5/10

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man #18

Summary: The Hunted story arc has really redeemed the ASM comics for me. This is another good issue that’s expanding on the back story while keeping the reader hooked. My only complaint is the art, it’s not bad, but I’m just not personally a huge fan of Ramos. If this story was being drawn by somebody else I’d be rating it even higher!

Rating: 8.5/10

blog.name: oxymitch
blog.title: Whatever Mitch
blog.description:
I am Mitch of Singapore, also an Ace. I enjoy reading superhero comics (especially Marvel); comic books aren't just for boys, girls read it too. However, I have no interest in any Marvel movie due to my jaded attitude, so I prefer Marvel cartoons like 90s X-Men TAS and Avengers EMH. 
Those Marvel comics I love reading are New Warriors, X-Men, Young Avengers, X-Factor, Avengers (not that Bendis era), Generation X, Avengers Academy and X-Force. 
Big fan of New Warriors and X-Men. 
My Favourite Marvel characters are...GAMBIT (Remy LeBeau), JUBILEE (Jubilation Lee), SPEEDBALL (Robbie Baldwin), WICCAN (Billy Kaplan), JUSTICE (Vance Astrovik), ROGUE (Anna Marie), SPEED (Tommy Shepherd), NIGHTCRAWLER (Kurt Wagner), FIRESTAR (Angelica Jones), QUICKSILVER (Pietro Maximoff), SHE-HULK (Jennifer Walters), QUASAR (Wendell Vaughn) and COSMO the space dog.

summary: The animal-themed supervillains are huddled under the bridge, trying to figure out what to do next. Vulture (Adrian Toomes)...
caption:
The animal-themed supervillains are huddled under the bridge, trying to figure out what to do next. Vulture (Adrian Toomes) makes up his fabricated story about Gibbon’s “last heroics” to make himself look good but in reality, both Vulture and Gibbon (Martin Blank) were actually running away from the Hunter-Bots. As well as Vulture left Gibbon to die at the hands of the Hunter-Bots to save himself. 

Just then, Spider-Man drops in and tries to tell everyone that Vulture is a liar but unfortunately, Rhino (Aleksei Sytsevich) interrupts him by calling out on his hypocrisy for leaving him to get captured by Taskmaster and Black Ant. Though in reality, Spider-Man had rushed in to help Aunt May and other civilians from the rubble but could not save Rhino in time. With Rhino’s interruption and the other supervillains agreeing with Vulture, Spider-Man could not argue anymore. 

- Amazing Spider-Man v5 #19, 2019

summary: I’m sorry but imagine Peter Parker being nominated for Queer Eye
body:
I’m sorry but imagine Peter Parker being nominated for Queer Eye

  • Aunt May definitely nominated him
  • His life seems like it’s super together from the outside but Lordy his apartment is MESSY
  • Not that anyone can blame him seeing as he’s running back and forth from college to internships to his job
  • (to his second secret job)
  • But no one needs to know about that
  • Shhhh🤫🤫
  • Peter is chilling on his couch talking Matt through busting a drug ring he can’t be there for when all of a sudden five gay men burst through his door and start tearing up the place
  • Tan kind of secretly adores his worn college look but he still tries to add some professional clothes to his wardrobe
  • Bobby immediately connect with the being adopted thing and they start talking
  • Peter is talking to Antoni about his obsessive ramen comsumption, when Tan and Jonathan come barelling out of his room with the Spider-Man suit in tow
  • Peter blanches
  • Then JVN goes “kinky boy” and they start laughing
  • Until Tan realizes the quality is much higher then any normal knock off and when he poses the question Peter stops breathing
  • And they all look at him
  • And as calmly as he can he says “well you know I take pictures of him for a living, well we also… spend some time together too..”
  • And he meant it in a cool brotherly hang out kinda way
  • But they take it a totally different way
  • And before you know it Peter is known as Spideys boyfriend
  • And JVN is asking about that spider DICK
  • “So like does it shoot out webs too?”
  • And Karamo is talking about respecting himself so his boyfriend can respect him
  • And Bobby is trying to add little Spider-Man perches in his house because he knows SM likes to be up high
  • (which Peter secretly appreciates but OH MY GOD)
  • The episode comes out and Aunt May won’t stop asking him if it’s true, and why he hid it
  • And Tony?
  • Tony won’t stop making fun of him for a full year
  • It’s all fine and dandy until the kidnapping starts, because apparently being fake outed as a superhero’s boyfriend comes with consequences
  • The Avengers keeping saving him , because OBVIOUSLY SPIDERMAN CANT
  • And eventually when it comes out that Peter actually IS Spider-Man, the episode becomes the most viewed episode on Netflix
  • Peter gets a little card from the fab five that pretty much says
  • Sorry
  • Peter smiles and writes back “it’s cool guys”
  • Then after a moments consideration he adds “thanks for the perches Bobby”

summary:
ok but ned and peter at prom
ned wears a super cute black tux w a floral print shirt + bow tie
peter reuses his tux from...
body:
ok but ned and peter at prom

  • ned wears a super cute black tux w a floral print shirt + bow tie
  • peter reuses his tux from homecoming but w a tasteful salmon pink dress shirt + bow tie (to match ned ofc)
  • they dance much more than they thought they would bc it’s fun even if they suck at it
  • ned wins prom king by surprise

(+bonus: after party at the denny’s down the street ofc)

summary: Hi!! im a new spideycat shipper and i wanna hear your thoughts abt their relationship in the ps4 version, do you think felicia...
question: Hi!! im a new spideycat shipper and i wanna hear your thoughts abt their relationship in the ps4 version, do you think felicia has feelings for him in this universe?
answer: Hello, sorry if I’m replying a little late. But yes, I believe she did care deeply for him at one point(I mean, it is mentioned that they were in a relationship). But it seems to be that the only evident time she shows any sort of care towards him is in the last dlc, Sliver Lining. The writing for her character seems a bit weak and showed her off as cold in the Heist story.

The writing for her character seems a bit weak and showed her off as cold in the Heist story.
